pre: Enaria is in the lowest level of the Gnomish city. If I can rid the world of her wretched form, perhaps I can also become magically adept myself.
researched: Now that I have defeated Enaria, secrets have unveiled themselves about a new power. I have always adored reading about the ancient mages of the past able to detonate mountains with a simple blink. After Enaria's fall, I felt beset by a compelling influential presence. I wonder what it may unveil to me.
